description: A collection of circles in a thin, tilted rectangular formation that tapers to a triangular point at the top; there is also a thin line of circles extending straight downwards from the bottom right corner of the rectangular formation and a small circular formation of circles connected by another thin line of circles to the bottom left of the rectangular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a greenish-blue triangle in the center of the rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
